title: Large-Scale Micromasters Learner Success Prediction and Support Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Online Learning Experience and Intermediate-Level Expertise in Social Sciences
context.additional_context: Competency-Based Training Program in a BYOD Environment, Maximizing Learning Effectiveness Through Practical Projects and Formative Assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design of success prediction models by analyzing online behavioral data.
Learners can evaluate the impact of key engagement metrics (forum participation, assessment interactions, etc.) on learning outcomes.
Learners can propose personalized support strategies based on the correlation between foundational course achievement and final exam results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
